item.description:
Join us as check out the next restaurant in our North End dinner series- Piccolo Nido restaurant. This restaurant got great reviews on Yelp. We will be enjoying dinner, then heading to a location nearby for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink.

 

RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend as this will be a popular event. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a night of delicious Italian food, drinks and great company!
item.name: Join us for a North End Dinner & Drinks Series: Picollo Nido Restaurant
